-- Hoogle documentation, generated by Haddock
-- See Hoogle, http://www.haskell.org/hoogle/


-- | Conduit of keys pressed by xinput
--   
@package xinput-conduit
@version 0.0.0


-- | A conduit interface to XInput events.
module Data.Conduit.XInput

-- | Source of xinput keys.
xinputSource :: MonadIO m => Device -> ConduitM i (Event, KeyCode) m ExitCode

-- | Device identifier.
newtype Device
Device :: Int -> Device

-- | An event.
data Event
Press :: Event
Release :: Event

-- | Key code.
newtype KeyCode
KeyCode :: Int -> KeyCode
instance Num Device
instance Enum Event
instance Bounded Event
instance Eq Event
instance Show Event
instance Eq KeyCode
instance Show KeyCode
instance Num KeyCode
instance Ord KeyCode
